AND c.add_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}
AND g.goods_name LIKE '%'||#{userName}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.nickname LIKE '%'||#{usersName}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{usersName}, '%')

SELECT IFNULL(c.NAME,c.nickname) AS 'name', b.goods_id AS 'goodsId', b.goods_name AS 'goodsName', a.add_time AS 'addTime', a.goods_rank AS 'goodsRank', a.contents AS 'contents', a.spec_key_name AS 'specKeyName', e.bar_code AS 'barCode', e.goods_no AS 'goodsNo' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_comment a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods b ON b.goods_id = a.goods_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users c ON c.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_spec_goods_price e ON e.goods_id = a.goods_id AND e.spec_key = a.spec_key WHERE a.parent_id = '0'
AND a.add_time >= #{beginDate} AND a.add_time <= #{endDate}
